original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
14.5. Hetuhetusampayuttaduka
Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto
ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ
paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca
hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu
ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca
hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu
dhammo ca uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva
na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva
nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
